website_summaries.verdict: This moringa oil doesn't have a very thick consistency, but it does have some nice qualities including the cold-pressed formula and handy applicator.
pros: A natural oil that is cold pressed and doesn't contain additives
Feels soft and smooth on the skin
Handy pump bottle cuts down on messiness during application
cons: Consistency is thinner than some moringa oils, and it doesn't absorb very quickly
Some customers gripe that they received "rancid" oil – possibly from a bad batch

customer_reviews.title: I have always been disappointed when I find a Moringa seed oil that is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always been disappointed when I find a Moringa seed oil that is a lot cheaper than more expensive moringa oils on Amazon. I am sorry but I don't believe this is 100% pure Moringa oil. I think it is blended with some other oil. The slight nutty smell of pure moringa oil is not there. It is more liquidy and does not absorb as fast as pure moringa oil.
customer_reviews.author: massage therapist

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing & Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I use a little bit of Moringa oil on my face at night, immediately after using my natural facial cleanser. A little bit is all that is needed. It is very moisturizing and nourishing. In the morning my face is not oily, but looks deeply moisturized & rejuvenated. I believe the Moringa oil gives my face a glow and a refreshed appearance. Also, I believe this oil has helped to even out my skin tone and help to keep acne at bay. I've received many compliments about my skin since I've started using the Moringa oil. The scent is strong , almost medicinal, but subsides after some time. However, the benefits are definitely worth the consistent use.
customer_reviews.author: Genie X

customer_reviews.title: Nice Carrier Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil for my skin and hair care. It is a carrier oil that carries a punch, since it contains a lot of vitamins as well as antibacterial properties. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lilhappyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I apply the oil to my face and hands at night, before bed. In the morning, I have noticeably softer, smoother skin. I have also used it on a patch of eczema on my scalp. It doesn't itch nearly so badly now!
customer_reviews.author: Jaina Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: This oil revived my dry natural hair!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I wasn't frugal and hadn't taken a break from this product for a few months bc I was wondering why my hair looked like a parched tree for the last few weeks. I just used this again with my leave in conditioner and the moistness and shine were finally back. It combats the negative effects of hard water. This moringa oil literally revived my hair which is curly and type 3b/c. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: laayas

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair growth.
customer_reviews.text: Read that Moringa oil can reverse balding and have been using it for just over a year. I can see reasonable hair growth in previously bald spots. My wife says her hair is not as dry since we have been using this oil. It does have a fairly strong, nutty smell. It does not leave hair oily. The pump dispenser is quite handy, however it does have tendency to not dispense when the bottle gets half empty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice oil. It smells earthy like burdock and it smoothes my skin without leaving it greasy looking. I like the glass pump bottle as you get small drops in just the right amounts for your face without having excess all over your hands.
customer_reviews.author: hobbit

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It truly nourishes and hydrates
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It truly nourishes and hydrates. It even gives me that dewey tacky to the touch feeling which is amazing because we lose that as we age.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyoface

customer_reviews.title: i only use it at night if i do use it because it can be a bit much for me (because i don't like to "feel" moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: i use it all over...hair, face, body. For the face, i only use it at night if i do use it because it can be a bit much for me (because i don't like to "feel" moisturizer. I think its great. I have bought some for my friend as well and she loves it for her hair. A little squirt goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give 10 star for this one
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give 10 star for this one, it is a great for skin and hair care . If you are looking for something for your dryer skin and hair this one is the solution
customer_reviews.author: Ronaria

customer_reviews.title: I am not brought this again
customer_reviews.text: I would say Good for moisturizing , but this skin care may be too rich, so make my skin acne breakouts
customer_reviews.author: Fion

customer_reviews.title: My face is glowing
customer_reviews.text: This moringa oil has been a complete life saver this winter. My skin looks amazing and so soft. I use it only on my face after I wash it. Then after the oil sets I put on my normal moisturizer. It is not thick and is not greasy. It is really quite amazing. I even feel like it is helping my forehead lines since it is keeping me so moisturized throughout the day. I highly recommend this oil and this specific brand. The cold pressed is what you want for this type of facial oil.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizing oil that does not leave in oily residue !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all the benefits that I get from using this oil or use it anywhere from a hand lotion to moisturizing my face to adding it to my cuticle oil ! Absolutely worth every penny !
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: We both love it.
customer_reviews.text: I know alot moringa. Its the tree of life. My girlfriend and I use the oil on our skin. For wrinkles and lines. Sores on my bald head. My hair is starting to grow. We both love it.

customer_reviews.title: I have used it in my hair (4c natural) and my hair responds wonderfully to it
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying this oil immensely. My skin is clearing up and it feels so soft. I have used it in my hair (4c natural) and my hair responds wonderfully to it.

customer_reviews.text: This Moringa oil seems much better than the last one I purchased. I would say it's the real thing, fragrance and color appear true.

customer_reviews.text: It has a fast absorption into my skin. Not at all greasy.

customer_reviews.title: Strange, Nutty, Healthy Oil
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this oil. It does have a strange nutty scent but it doesn't linger and it's tolerable. You could add an essential oil to it to change the scent also. It melts into skin and hair so smoothly and doesn't leave a greasy film. I purchased this oil because of the health and beauty benefits associated with it. It can be used for facial and body skin as well as hair. I would definitely repurchase because it seems to be a really high quality oil for the price and the amount you get is great as well!

customer_reviews.text: Loved the dispenser..so easy to use and the feel of the product - very moisturizing and absorbs quickly!

I bought it because I started to get eczema flare ups and it would calm but leave crusty scab like patches but this oil helps clear it up and my skin feels and looks like regular skin. I also like it for my face, I have dry skin but I also get super oily in some areas, this helps with both problems .

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice oil for massaging feet and hands
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice oil for massaging feet and hands. Also, I have used it on my face and neck. The fragrance is pleasant. I'm sure this will always be part of my routine for achieving smoother skin and stronger finger nails and toe nails.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not pure moringa oil. Doesn't absorb on the skin and leaves your face oily. Broke me out!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this oil!!! I use it for multiple purposes with excellent results. I add a little to some baking soda for a weekly gentle exfoliant--Amazing!!! I add a few drops to my lotions-incredible!!! I have even added a few drops to my conditioner. My husband and I have applied it directly to achy or painful areas and it works amazingly well at relieving the pain. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: simplyaredhead

customer_reviews.title: I have used this for both my hair and skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for both my hair and skin. It absorbs quickly, doesn't leave an oily feel or residue (remember to use only a little) and has left my skin soft and my hair shiny. I've also massaged it into my cuticles and rubbed it on dry spots on my feet. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C

customer_reviews.title: Love this and use it daily for face moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this and use it daily for face moisturizer. Is the best remedy for hemorrhoids I've ever found.. period.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a couple months. I use it on my face and hands morning and night. Smells awful so I put a few drops of lavender oil in the bottle. My skin is so soft! Small lines are gone. My skin is so supple. I’ve used everything from Okay to La Mer and I’ll be using this for a while. I used to have these little white bumps on my forehead almost like whiteheads and those are gone. I’ve also noticed my pores are smaller.
customer_reviews.author: PLP

customer_reviews.title: Rancid upon arrival :(
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, it is a little less expensive than the moringa oil I was getting from a local shop. The bottle I received had a very strong rancid odor (like rotting walnuts), it was really thick, and it had a dark yellow color. The local brand I have smells fresh and slightly nutty, was thinner like a avocado oil, and was more clear in color. I tried rubbing it on my leg just to get it off my hand and it was really thick and sticky. It did not absorb well. I have already started the return process. Maybe I just got a bad one out of the lot - but it was REALLY BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It removed the pain I had in my knees and legs. Will order more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Pianki

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased. Highly absorbent and potent!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using moringa powder and seeds for a while, but I am new to moringa oil. The oil certainly smells pure and green and very familiar, like moringa itself. It absorbs into skin very well and it almost vanishes. I am using it on my face and on a scar as well, so I will update in the months to come. This is my new favorite product and a little goes a long way. I think I will purchase for a couple family members this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: MangoSunset

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for my skin!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. It's a bit heavy, so one pump for my face is plenty. It's all I use for my skin now, keeps it moisturized and looking great! Scent is a little earthy when going on, but that dissipates quickly. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Really helped dog and grandson
customer_reviews.text: It stopped the itch our dog had with an area on his skin. When our grandson had a huge bite on his leg, we used the oil on it and it stopped. My daughter asked if we could order some for her too. Great product and without the chemicals that could harm both pets and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I am loving this Moringa oil! I have used ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this Moringa oil! I have used it on dry cracked heels and it really seems to be helping. I used it on my hair that was very dry due to hormones. I rub it in and waited just about ten minutes then washed. What didn’t soak into my hair washed right out and afterwards my hair was soft, silky and manageable. I’m using it on my face and the rest of my body mixed with Australian Emu Oil with a few essential oils added and at 56 my skin is smooth and silky. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: I Love 💕 this oil!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is very nice on my skin, it’s moisturizing and makes my skin feel silky soft!! I use this oil in the winter months to help add a boost of moisture and it has warming properties to it as well!! It’s a nice thick oil that absorbs into your skin nicely and lasts all day!! I recommend this oil it’s perfect for your skin.

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell as good as a different brand that is no longer available. it's not an unpleasant odor. It's the best thing I have used on my face! It doesn't clog my pipes. I live in Minnesota and in the winters it's very dry and cold. The last few weeks we have had extreme winds that combined with the cold, dry air leaves my face red and chapped. This makes a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: after 2 days my joints began to ache and my legs hurt really bad, got off of it and the aches went ...
customer_reviews.text: i only gave it one star because, i can not use this product, after 2 days my joints began to ache and my legs hurt really bad, got off of it and the aches went away, so tried it again and the aches started all over again. i really wanted this oil to work for me but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: robert crawford

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. First
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. First, the bottle is just the right size to be easily portable. Also, the pump dispenser is great. It works well and spills are avoided. You can get more or less by changing how hard you pump. I have been using the oil for about three months, mostly on my skin, occasionally on my hair as a pre-shampoo treatment. It is quickly absorbed and does not leave the skin greasy and shiny. My skin is definitely improved. I like the woody smell of it. I hope I will never be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Edmunds
